long_prompt: Four large, bright yellow sunflowers are arranged in a neat, circular bouquet on a rustic wooden table, while three traditional blue-and-white banjoes are lined up on the same table.
A lush field of four sunflowers, each with a unique yellow petal pattern, is dotted with three vintage banjoes in a rustic display near a country farmhouse.

Four tall sunflowers, each with a bright yellow center and long, green stalks, stand in a neat row on a wooden garden bench. Three blue-and-white striped banjoes sit in the background, adding a touch of vintage charm to the sunny outdoor scene.
negative_long_prompt: Five large, radiant yellow sunflowers are positioned in a beautiful, sunlit garden, with two classic blue-and-white banjoes resting on a wooden bench nearby.
A serene countryside scene features three sunflowers, each with distinct patterns, growing alongside a single rustic banjo leaning against a weathered fence near a quaint barn.
Four sunflowers, each with a bright yellow center and long, green stalks, stand in a neat row on a wooden garden bench.
